paper_abstract: For the multivariate continuous function, using constructive feedforward L-2(R) radial basis function (RBF) neural network, we prove that a L-2(R) RBF neural network with n + 1 hidden neurons can interpolate n + 1 multivariate samples with zero error. Then, we prove that the L-2(R) RBF neural network can uniformly approximate any continuous multivariate function with arbitrary precision. The correctness and effectiveness are verified through eight numeric experiments.
paper_title: Multivariate numerical approximation using constructive L-2(R) RBF neural network
